A sleek Chrome extension that automatically extracts and organizes your Costco receipt data.
Overview
Costco Receipt Scanner is a powerful yet simple Chrome extension that helps you digitize and track your Costco shopping expenses. Simply scan your receipts and let the extension automatically extract, organize, and analyze your purchase data.
Key Features

One-Click Scanning: Instantly scan and process Costco receipts with a single click
Automatic Data Extraction: Smart recognition of items, prices, dates, and transaction details
Purchase History: View and search your complete Costco purchase history
Expense Analytics: Track spending patterns and get insights into your Costco purchases
Clean Interface: Modern, intuitive design that's easy to use
Privacy-First: All data processing happens locally - no data is collected or stored remotely

How to Use

Click the extension icon while viewing your Costco digital receipt
Press "Download Receipts" to begin processing
All the data downloaded in JSON format for your analsyis

Privacy & Security

No data is collected or transmitted to external servers
All processing happens locally in your browser
Zero tracking or analytics

Technical Details
Regular updates and improvements
